thread.title: L.Flynn
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by L.Flynn

author: L.Flynn
title: L.Flynn
text: The silk pillowcases are very good quality and feel. I know they are better for your hair and easy on women's face as we sleep. I have washed them and they are wonderful. I wash with woolite on gentle, if I'm in a hurry I put them on the dryer with nothing but other silk pillowcases, on a gentle, low heat. If your not in a hurry you can hang them to dry for later use. I highly recommend these!
